data.name: My Girlfriend is a Mermaid!? Demo
data.detailed_description:
"She is Mermaid" is an VN game developed jointly by a Japanese and Korean team.
Having been regarded highly among players, it is now available on PC!
Besides the relaxing and cute sound effects, the backgrounds have also been upgraded for the PC version!

This demo version include the first Chapter.
After Other serious stories, let's relax for a while!
*The demo version will be added to other languages.
data.about_the_game:
"She is Mermaid" is an VN game developed jointly by a Japanese and Korean team.
Having been regarded highly among players, it is now available on PC!
Besides the relaxing and cute sound effects, the backgrounds have also been upgraded for the PC version!

This demo version include the first Chapter.
After Other serious stories, let's relax for a while!
*The demo version will be added to other languages.
data.short_description: Centered on legends and stories of mermaids, experience an amazing summer vacation with lovely mermaids now! This demo version include the first Chapter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Xp
  • Processor: Pentium3 1.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen resolution: 1280 * 720+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7(Recommended)/WIN8/Vista
  • Processor: Pentium3 1.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen resolution: 1280 * 720+
